about_copy.paragraph: This is my website. There are many websites out there like it. But this one is mine. My website is my best friend. It is my life. I must master it as I must master my life. My website, without me, is useless. Without my website, I am useless.

I have ideas and feelings. They dictate my work. And I like building things. And if you want a thing built, you are free to message me. Fair warning, I will probably decline. Still, you, and I, are free.
